habitat_category.name: habitat_category
habitat_category.label: Habitat Category
habitat_category.helptext: Select a description of the habitat surrounding the nest. If other is selected describe the habitat in the Habitat Description field. Leave blank if not listed.

habitat_description.name: habitat_description
habitat_description.label: Habitat Description
habitat_description.helptext: General description of the habitat characteristics of the nest site location.

location_description.name: location_description
location_description.label: Location Description
location_description.helptext: General description of the survey area location and relevant landmarks (e.g. mountain ranges, drainages, landscape features).

nest_substrate.name: nest_substrate
nest_substrate.label: Nest Substrate
nest_substrate.helptext: The substrate upon which the nest is located. More specific details should be provided in the nest comments field.

probable_origin.name: probable_origin
probable_origin.label: Probable Origin
probable_origin.helptext: Select the species you believe initially constructed the nest. Probable origin is based on which species the observer believed to have initially constructed the nest. Variables such as size, material, and placement are considered when assessing probable origin. If other is selected describe the species in the comments.

nest_comments.name: nest_comments
nest_comments.label: Nest Comments
nest_comments.helptext: Description of the unchanging characteristics of the nest itself. Including, but not limited to: tree or shrub species, height above ground, etc.
